title: LiAngelo Ball has Heard all the Haters, Ready to Prove Them Wrong this Summer | SLAM Day in the Life
author: SLAM
description:
Y’all been asking what LiAngelo Ball has been up to, so we pulled up to Chino Hills last month to catch up with the legend himself. The leading scorer on that historic Chino Hills HS squad that went undefeated and finished ranked No. 1 in the country has been training (and buying up property, as you’ll see) so that he’s ready for when that call happens.
